directions: Heat the broth and potatoes in a 4-quart saucepan over medium-high heat to a boil.  Reduce the heat to low.  Cover and cook for 5 minutes or until the potatoes are tender.
Stir the beef, vegetable juice, tomatoes, vegetables, thyme and 1/8 teaspoon ground black pepper in the saucepan. Cover and cook for 15 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
ingredients: 1 3/4 cups Swanson® Beef Broth or Swanson® 50% Less Sodium Beef Broth
1 cup cut up canned whole tomatoes
1 (16 ounce) package frozen mixed vegetables (carrots, corn, green beans, peas), thawed
title: Savory Vegetable Beef Soup by Swanson®
